title: The Kite Trust 25th Birthday Bash!
description:
The Kite Trust is turning 25 this year!
Come and celebrate with us in an evening of eclectic entertainment to recognise and support local LGBT+ communities!
Zoe Lyons: Edinburgh Comedy Award nominee and Mock The Week regular with delightful quick fire, razor sharp observational gags
Other acts include:
The Kite Trusts very own drama group QUACY (Queer Arts Cambridge Youth) will be presenting their first production What you don´t see, a devised theatre play made from the young people’s own stories, dreams, fears and desires.
Sing Out! Cambridge’ LGBT+ choir
Circus Act- Daisy Belle – Aerial hoop
Auction
Compere for the show is the charismatic Jonathan Mayor with his marvellously wicked sense of humour and fun who brings a touch of glitz and glamour to the stage.

Price: £15 balcony seat, £20 cabaret table (+ booking fee)

All profits will go towards supporting LGBT+ young people in Cambridgeshire
Tickets on sale: https://www.junction.co.uk/the-kite-trust-birthday-bash#tickets
